summary:
Dark Souls III Sounds
When your playing Skyrim, do you ever feel that you want to also play dark souls? Well look no more this mod replaces some of the sound files, to improve the feel of the game although this mod will be better used with undiscovered locations and Customizable UI replacers
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Dark Souls III Sounds[/size]

When your playing Skyrim, do you ever feel that you want to also play dark souls? well look no more this mod replaces some of the sound files but will replace many more with the sounds from dark souls for a more immerisve experience.
I encourage you to use this mod once our dark souls conversion is completed, use this in conjuction with Customizable UI replacers my other mod.

[youtube]heCOQqrb9Jk[/youtube]

[youtube]aSYLB_4dgSU[/youtube]

[size=3]Upcoming Features[/size]

[/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=1]Hit Sound[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=1]Main Menu[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=1]Activate[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=1]Will Fix Discovery Sound[/size][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=1]
[/size][/font][/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]MORE TO COME!![/size]

[size=3]SneakAttack/Crit Sound[/size]

Install_Directory (skyrim/data/sound/fx/ui)
[/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]ui_sneakattack_01.wav[/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS]
[size=3]
Discovery Sound[/size]

Install_Directory (skyrim/data/music)
[/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_genericlocation_01.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_genericlocation_02.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_genericlocation_03.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_dread_01.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_dread_02.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_dread_03.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_dread_04.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_village_01.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_village_02.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_village_03.wav[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]mus_discover_highhrothgar.wav[/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS]
[size=3]Installation[/size]

Easy as pie
Click the files you want and just drag and drop into the appropriate directory ;)

Uninstallation
Just find the files and delete them :)

Special Thanks ;)

FromSoftware - Souls Sounds and Making Dark Souls Series
SJH - Helping test + videos
[/font]
author: BrendanW
